text: Everyone loves a good celebrity gossip story, especially when it involves a cheating scandal. But it ’ s easy to forget that behind those tabloids and tweets are real people who are facing feelings of hurt and betrayal. We hear of celebrity couples who split all the time, some of them because one or both partners strayed. But sometimes the couple stays together, moving past the infidelity. These public figures chose to stand by their men ( or women ) and move forward.
